channel.title: ChaoticEdgePk || 317
channel.description:
[CENTER] :drool: [B][U][SIZE=5]ChaoticEdgePk || 24/7! || Fun Pking Server![/SIZE][/U][/B] :drool:
[B][U]Why Us?[/U][/B] Well I guess why not!! This is my first ever Client release and built on source! I have merely worked on this source for around 5/6 days now and I will be constantly
working on it, releasing more In-Game items, Bosses, Rewards and Features! As the title reads 'Almost 24/7', The only downtime the server will have will be due
to me working on it and the online status on this page will now currently [B][U]NOT[/U][/B] be updated due to the server being run 24/7!! :gg: I hope you guys like
my first ever RSPS!!;p
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=chaoticedgepk.no-ip.org][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/chaoticedgepk.no-ip.org.png[/img][/url]
[CODE]Multiple prices fixed Announcements fixed Dragon claws Chaotic Rapier Chaotic Maul Working CC! Relocated the shops Added some new shops Staff location! Rollback problem fixed[/CODE]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4003731/Client.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002117/Screenshot_8.png[/img]
Below you will find a range of images!
[SPOIL][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002126/Claws_Spec.gif[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002127/Screenshot_7__2_.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002130/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002129/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002201/LowLvlTrain.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4002202/kdb.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4003570/Maul.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4003569/Rapier_hit.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/4007198/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007199/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007200/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007204/Screenshot_5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007205/Screenshot_6.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4007206/Screenshot_2.png[/img][/SPOIL]
[B][U]Brief video! Doesn't include all features[/U][/B]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J4AiWz7Aj7E&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
:fp: [B][U][COLOR="#FF0000"]Encountered some issues with the client![/COLOR][/U][/B] :fp: For people that are receiving the; [QUOTE]Java Virtual Machine Launcher A Java Exception Has Occured[/QUOTE] Error upon opening the client.jar, Please upgrade both your java and JDK to the latest version! This will fix any issues you experience! See requirements below if
you experience a problem.
[U]Requirements[/U]
[ul][*]Latest version of java; [*]JDK 1.8.0[/ul]
[SIZE=5]Download Link.[/SIZE] (Updated as of Monday 15th April 2014) :gg:
[B][U]V1.2 Client!![/U][/B]
Download Link: [url=http://uppit.com/zmrgnxbd7ws9/Chaotics_Client_V1.2.jar]Chaotics Client V1.2[/url] [/CENTER]

item.title: ChaoticEdgePk || 317
item.dc:creator: @zeejr_xo zeejr_xo
item.description:
@zeejr_xo wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:4, topic:542160”]I see no reason for client scan…

also don’t use mediafire to share client, because for some people (like me) wont receive jarred client, but we will get client.jar.rar which makes it useless…

fix those and gl[/quote]

Thread is updated

Thank you!

Read full topic

[CENTER] :drool: [B][U][SIZE=5]ChaoticEdgePk || 24/7! || Fun Pking Server![/SIZE][/U][/B] :drool:

[B][U]Why Us?[/U][/B]
Well I guess why not!! This is my first ever Client release and built on source! I have merely worked on this source for around 5/6 days now and I will be constantly

working on it, releasing more In-Game items, Bosses, Rewards and Features! As the title reads ‘Almost 24/7’, The only downtime the server will have will be due

to me working on it and the online status on this page will now currently [B][U]NOT[/U][/B] be updated due to the server being run 24/7!! :gg: I hope you guys like

my first ever RSPS!!;p

you experience a problem.

[]JDK 1.8.0[/ul]
